This game is really fun. Its only a bit gory when you hook someone but other than that its not bad. Its really fun with friends and both survivor and killer are really fun to play. You can unlock most characters for free to play currency but the movie, show, and video game characters cost real money. Only 5 dollars so not too bad but there are more free to play characters than pay characters.

Игра однобокая, постоянное необоснованное преимущество Убийц над выжившими, а самое главное - консольщиков перед игроками ПК версий. Удовольствия никакого.

Great game that has it's fair share of replay value. 
Pros:
Seeing or playing as your favorite killers/survivors from some of your favorite games/movies. 
High risk/High reward gameplay style. Lots of customization for cosmetics and in-game perks to enhance your playstyle.
Cons:
The Killer controls the game. Gameplay experience will differ for each individual but be prepared to come across Killers who will camp your body so you can't be rescued from the hook. Unsportsmanlike behavior is not uncommon in most games though so take it for what you will.
Overall Recommendation:
I recommend you give it a shot, especially if you see some of your fan favorites like Freddy or Michael Myers.
Give yourself a chance to learn the game (maps, killers, survivors etc.) and you'll have a blast.
